name: decennially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that happens every ten years: Successive censuses were taken decennially (1907, 1917, 1927, and so on). The conferences occurred roughly decennially to discuss medical advances.
More examplesFewer examplesWe are required to submit the figures decennially.The corrected information is shown decennially by dots plotted on the maps.The Massachusetts constitution of 1780 required property to be valued decennially.The population was measured decennially by the census.The table shows the increase of the UK population decennially since 1830.
